firm_details.name: Coastal Development Partners
firm_details.about: Coastal Development Partners is a full-service real estate development and investment firm focused on residential and mixed-use projects in the Southeastern United States. With over 25 years of combined experience, our team has successfully developed more than 2,000 residential units and over $500 million in real estate assets. We specialize in identifying high-growth markets and creating sustainable, community-focused developments that deliver value to our investors and enhance the neighborhoods we serve.
